title: New Tailfin SFM clamps two cages per side to your suspension fork, won’t slip w/ 3-5kg of cargo
content:
Tailfin likes to say that ‘the best bike for bikepacking is the one your already own.’ That’s been one of the driving forces in developing their Aeropack and universal rack system—even if your bike doesn’t have any braze-ons, there’s a good chance Tailfin has an option that will fit. But when it comes to the

The post New Tailfin SFM clamps two cages per side to your suspension fork, won’t slip w/ 3-5kg of cargo appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Zach Overholt
